function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Slow and haphazard initial reaction by the eu","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited mandate on public health for the eu","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political and economic debates about financial recovery instruments","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political challenges to the implementation of the egd, including opt-outs by member states and tight timelines for introducing the climate law","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Polarized opinion on the egd even before the onset of the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty due to government instruction changes","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of social media for politics and decision-making","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of housing units across states in the datasets","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in project continuity due to pandemic-related decision-making processes","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changing trust in local authorities","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of housing policy on dispersion of covid-19","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic policies on housing sector and green buildings","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient control for socioeconomic, demographic, political, healthcare, testing, behavioral, and climate factors in previous studies may lead to unreliable findings.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in the classification of urban-rural levels based on outdated scheme","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No language restrictions applied to study search","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Open collaboration between research institutions and public authorities may lead to unfiltered or unverified data being used in decision-making processes.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of division of agreed goals between research institutions and public authorities may lead to conflicting priorities and objectives in the development of public monitoring programmes.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Publication of real-time urban movement data and covid-19 dashboard may lead to public panic or misinformation if not presented and interpreted accurately.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neoliberal surveillance mechanism through big data","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of research results","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unanimous implementation of solutions not achieved in organisations a and c","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited work from home periods for employees during lockdown","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of purposive sampling technique based on ease of access may result in a biased sample selection and overlooking important perspectives.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing a qualitative research methodology without considering the impact of covid-19 and the potential changes in data collection due to lockdown rules may lead to incomplete or inaccurate findings.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 through global travel","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential conflict of interest in research findings","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate evidence and data sharing","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exaggerated estimates of infection rates and case fatality rate","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narratives of freedom from interference may lead to refusal of public health policies, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of policies across countries may lead to different outcomes in infection rates.","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitivity of estimates to withholding regional data blocks may introduce uncertainty in the assessment of policy effectiveness.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imposing assumptions regarding the temporal structure of policy effects","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conspiracy linking 5g and covid-19 leading to disrupted connectivity","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incidents of destroying cellular base stations due to conspiracy theories linking 5g networks and the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multiple rounds of surveys conducted with construction professionals","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International collaboration involving 25 academics creates potential for transmission of contagious diseases across borders.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compliance with governmental mobility restrictions leading to reduced visits to green spaces.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent international regulations for covid-19 chest ct image data sharing","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-persons","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no english translation might lead to language and publication bias.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worldwide spread of sars-cov-2 leading to containment measures and quarantine","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of national health monitoring and surveillance system for physical activity in italy","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 epidemic","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate control measures of social protection and economic package","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-boundary and cross-sectoral transmission of covid-19","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Globalization and increased international travel enabling the importation of invasive mosquito vectors and pathogens","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of public health challenges in developing countries due to inward focus of developed economies","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven responses and equivocal commitments to change","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"}]}
